title: Median of Two Sorted Arrays
statement: Given two sorted arrays of sizes N and M, find the median of the combined sorted array. The overall run time complexity should be O(log(min(N,M))).
input_format:
First line contains N and M.
Second line contains N space-separated integers (first sorted array).
Third line contains M space-separated integers (second sorted array).
output_format: Print the median with exactly 1 decimal place.
